pullrequest.title: Add clipping for depth camera on rgbd camera sensor

content.raw:
I got it working, the reason for the above problem seems to be that ogre only allows one clipping distance for the rgbd sensor so I had to do manual clipping in the Rgbd camera file

The one caveat to this workaround is that the assumption is made that the rgb far clipping will be greater than depth far clipping and rgb near clipping will be less than depth near clipping
